death_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的军事家、政治家，中华人民共和国元帅之一，中国人民解放军的创始人和缔造者之一。
description.en: A Chinese Communist military commander and politician, one of the Marshals of the People's Republic of China, and one of the founders of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物。
description.en: The paramount leader of the People's Republic of China from 1978 to 1989.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任国防部长。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, who served as Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 1958年在中国人民解放军内部开展的一场政治运动，主要批判在军队建设中照搬苏联经验的“教条主义”倾向。
description.en: A political movement within the People's Liberation Army in 1958, primarily criticizing the 'dogmatism' of mechanically copying Soviet experiences in army building.

description.zh-cn: 苏联武装力量培养诸兵种合成军队军官的最高军事学府。
description.en: A high-level military educational institution of the Soviet Armed Forces.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席、中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Former Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Former Chairman of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央军事委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会领导下的最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The highest military leading body under the leadership of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国防委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防委员会
en: National Defense Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 1954年至1975年间中华人民共和国的最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The supreme military leading body of the People's Republic of China from 1954 to 1975.

nodes.id: 中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会

zh-cn: 中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 1949年至1954年间中华人民共和国的最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The supreme military leading body of the People's Republic of China from 1949 to 1954.

nodes.id: 国民革命军第十八集团军第129师

zh-cn: 国民革命军第十八集团军第129师
en: 129th Division of the Eighteenth Army Group of the National Revolutionary Army

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期由中国工农红军改编的八路军主力部队之一。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Eighth Route Army, adapted from the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 1945年至1949年间中国国民党与中国共产党之间爆发的内战。
description.en: A civil war fought between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China from 1945 to 1949.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战时期中国人民解放军的主力部队之一，后改编为第二野战军。
description.en: One of the main forces of the People's Liberation Army during the second Chinese Civil War, later reorganized into the Second Field Army.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战时期，中国人民解放军发动的“三大战役”之一。
description.en: One of the 'Three Great Campaigns' launched by the People's Liberation Army during the second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 刘伯承的第三任妻子。
description.en: The third wife of Liu Bocheng.

description.zh-cn: 刘伯承的第一任妻子。
description.en: The first wife of Liu Bocheng.

description.zh-cn: 刘伯承的第二任妻子。
description.en: The second wife of Liu Bocheng.

description.zh-cn: 刘伯承与程宜芝之子。
description.en: Son of Liu Bocheng and Cheng Yizhi.

description.zh-cn: 刘伯承与汪荣华之子，曾任装甲兵部队作战部副部长，少将。
description.en: Son of Liu Bocheng and Wang Ronghua, former deputy director of the Operations Department of the Armored Forces, Major General.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪30年代至40年代，中国抵抗日本全面侵略的战争。
description.en: A war fought in the 1930s and 1940s between China and Japan.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党为反击国民党而发动的武装起义，被认为是中共独立领导武装斗争和创建军队的开始。
description.en: An armed rebellion organized by the Communist Party of China against the Kuomintang, regarded as the beginning of the CPC's independent leadership of armed struggle and army building.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，中国人民解放军的主要缔造者之一。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China and one of the main founders of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首任国务院总理。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 第一次国共内战期间，中国工农红军主力从长江以南各革命根据地向陕甘革命根据地进行的战略转移。
description.en: A military retreat undertaken by the Red Army of the Communist Party of China to evade the pursuit of the Kuomintang army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军军事学院

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军军事学院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期，为培养、提高解放军高级指挥员的军政素质而创办的最高军事学府。
description.en: The highest military academy established in the early days of the People's Republic of China to train and improve the military and political qualities of senior commanders of the PLA.

description.zh-cn: 自1938年1月邓小平调任129师政委起，刘伯承与邓小平长期并肩战斗，共同领导129师和第二野战军，他们的部队被称为“刘邓大军”。两人建立了深厚的战友情谊，邓小平在刘伯承逝世后主持其追悼会并撰文悼念。
description.en: Starting from January 1938 when Deng Xiaoping was appointed political commissar of the 129th Division, Liu Bocheng and Deng Xiaoping fought side by side for a long time, jointly leading the 129th Division and the Second Field Army. Their troops were known as the 'Liu-Deng Army'. They established a deep comradeship; Deng Xiaoping presided over Liu's memorial service and wrote an article in his memory after his death.

description.zh-cn: 在1958年的军委扩大会议上，彭德怀等人将刘伯承作为军事教条主义的代表进行批判。
description.en: At the enlarged meeting of the Military Commission in 1958, Peng Dehuai and others criticized Liu Bocheng as a representative of military dogmatism.

description.zh-cn: 在1958年的反教条主义运动中，刘伯承受到批判，随后被免去高等军事学院的领导职务并被闲置。
description.en: During the anti-dogmatism campaign in 1958, Liu Bocheng was criticized, subsequently removed from his leadership position at the Higher Military Academy, and sidelined.

description.zh-cn: 1935年红一、四方面军会合后，因反对张国焘的南下主张，刘伯承被免去总参谋长职务。
description.en: After the merging of the First and Fourth Front Armies of the Red Army in 1935, Liu Bocheng was dismissed from his position as Chief of the General Staff for opposing Zhang Guotao's proposal to move south.

description.zh-cn: 1928年底至1930年8月，刘伯承在苏联伏龙芝军事学院学习。
description.en: From late 1928 to August 1930, Liu Bocheng studied at the Frunze Military Academy in the Soviet Union.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 刘伯承在多个时期担任军事委员会副主席，而毛泽东担任主席。
description.en: Liu Bocheng served as Vice Chairman of the Military Commission during several periods while Mao Zedong was the Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 刘伯承在华国锋担任中共中央军委主席期间，任军委副主席。
description.en: Liu Bocheng served as Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission when Hua Guofeng was Chairman.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防委员会

description.zh-cn: 刘伯承在刘少奇担任中华人民共和国国防委员会主席期间，任副主席。
description.en: Liu Bocheng served as Vice Chairman of the National Defense Council when Liu Shaoqi was Chairman.

relationships.target: 中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会
国民革命军第十八集团军第129师

description.zh-cn: 作为中原野战军司令员，指挥部队参与淮海战役。
description.en: As the commander of the Central Plains Field Army, he commanded troops in the Huaihai Campaign.

position.zh-cn: 中共前敌委员会参谋团参谋长
position.en: Chief of Staff of the CPC Front Committee Staff Group

description.zh-cn: 刘伯承是南昌起义的领导人之一，担任起义总参谋长。
description.en: Liu Bocheng was one of the leaders of the Nanchang Uprising, serving as the chief of general staff of the uprising.

description.zh-cn: 在抗日战争期间，刘伯承担任八路军129师师长，领导开辟晋冀鲁豫边区，并指挥了百团大战等多项重要战役。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, Liu Bocheng served as the commander of the 129th Division of the Eighth Route Army, led the establishment of the Shanxi-Hebei-Shandong-Henan border region, and commanded many important campaigns, including the Hundred Regiments Offensive.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战期间，刘伯承担任晋冀鲁豫军区、中原军区及第二野战军司令员，指挥了上党战役、淮海战役、渡江战役等一系列决定性战役。
description.en: During the second Chinese Civil War, Liu Bocheng served as commander of the Shanxi-Hebei-Shandong-Henan Military Region, Central Plains Military Region, and Second Field Army, commanding a series of decisive campaigns including the Shangdang Campaign, Huaihai Campaign, and Yangtze River Crossing Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 刘伯承参加了长征，期间担任中央革命军事委员会总参谋长等职，指挥了强渡乌江、金沙江等战斗。
description.en: Liu Bocheng participated in the Long March, during which he served as Chief of the General Staff of the Central Revolutionary Military Commission and commanded battles such as the forced crossings of the Wu and Jinsha rivers.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军军事学院

description.zh-cn: 1951年，刘伯承受命组建中国人民解放军军事学院并担任首任院长兼政委，为解放军正规化建设做出重要贡献。
description.en: In 1951, Liu Bocheng was ordered to establish the PLA Military Academy and served as its first president and political commissar, making significant contributions to the regularization of the PLA.
